headline: Alexandria Refinances Long Debt To Rework Interest Costs And Maturities
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (NYSE:ARE) has completed a series of debt refinancing actions involving long dated senior notes. The company ran tender offers to repurchase portions of its senior notes due 2050, 2051, and 2052. At the same time, Alexandria launched a new fixed rate senior note offering as part of a coordinated capital structure adjustment. Alexandria Real Estate Equities focuses on life science and related real estate, a segment that often relies on long term funding to...
